title: Man involved in infant PD Smoke Shop shooting charged
content:
AMARILLO, TX (KFDA) -
Police say the Randall County District Attorney’s Office filed a complaint based on information they provided.
John Lusk is being charged with Aggravated Assault with a Deadly Weapon and Injury to a Child.
Lusk is currently being held in the Potter County Correctional Center for: Parole Violation warrant, Evading Arrest/Detention with Motor Vehicle, Unlawful Possession of a Firearm by a Felon, Prohibited Weapon and Driving while License Invalid/Suspended with Previous Conviction.
According to the Amarillo Police Department the infant involved in the PD Smoke Shop shooting remains in stable condition.
